attributes.action: Make it ILLEAGLE to release ANYONE from prison for child sexual abuse ..
attributes.background:
People who commit this crime need to know they will NEVER get there kicks EVER again..
Releasing them allows them there kicks with children again & again..
Something that Goverment should NOT be part of !!!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what specific action you'd like. 

If you'd like people convicted of child sexual abuse to be given life imprisonment, you could start a new petition asking for that to happen.

If you'd like to see tougher sentences , you could also sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/214686
